Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Byron Sunseeker Motel in Byron Bay, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Byron Bay Golf Course and Tallow Beach. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Cape Byron Lighthouse and Wategos Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Byron Sunseeker Motel in Byron Bay, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Byron Bay Golf Course and Tallow Beach. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Cape Byron Lighthouse and Wategos Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Byron Bay Golf Course - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Tallow Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Cape Byron Lighthouse - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Wategos Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Kings Beach - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Tyagarah Nature Reserve - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Lake Ainsworth Sport and Recreation Centre - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Lennox Head Surf Life Saving Club - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi
Ballina Golf Club - 21.8 km / 13.6 mi
Ballina Jockey Club - 21.9 km / 13.6 mi
Shelly Beach - 22.7 km / 14.1 mi
Ballina Fair Shopping Centre - 22.8 km / 14.1 mi
Lighthouse Beach - 23.4 km / 14.6 mi
Ballina Naval and Maritime Museum - 24.2 km / 15.1 mi

The preferred airport for Byron Sunseeker Motel is Ballina, NSW (BNK-Ballina - Byron Gateway) - 20.5 km / 12.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
